mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.text, p.create_time, p.update_time, prc.read_count, pl.like_count, temp.comment_count FROM paper p INNER JOIN paper_like pl on p.id = pl.paper_id INNER JOIN paper_read_count prc on p.id = prc.paper_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT count(*) AS comment_count, pc.paper_id FROM paper_comment pc WHERE pc.active = 1 and pc.enable = 1 and pc.paper_id = #{id} GROUP BY paper_id ) temp on temp.paper_id = p.id where p.enable = 1 and p.active = 1 and p.id = #{id}
